tool.name: IsSimple
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayInputPolygon False output_data_Result $output_data_Result name IsSimple InputPolygon $InputPolygon prefer $prefer response $response transmissionMode_Result $OutputSection_Result.transmissionMode_Result

param.name: InputPolygon
param.label: the first geometry
param.help: the first geometry to compare against. The following data types are allowed in the txt file: xml

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_Result
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

tool.help: This service shall return a true value if and only if geometry g has no anomalous geometric points, such as self intersection or self tangency. Simple curves intersect themselves only at their endpoints (only if they are also closed, see next function).
